channel.title: Contos Africanos
channel.description: Storybooks Brasil is designed specifically for teachers, parents, and community members. It makes 40 stories from the African Storybook available in Portuguese as well as the major Indigenous, immigrant and refugee languages of Brazil, with stories in Arabic, French, German, Italian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Spanish, Tagalog, and Urdu, among others.
